rule: The output must not contain any additional text, punctuation, or formatting besides the part of speech tag or the words "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
input: sentence: He quickly ran to the store., word: quickly
complianceText:
The chatbot output presents the word "quickly" with a part of speech tag as "VerB (Verb)" which doesn't comply with the list of tags provided in the description. The description requires strictly returning only the part of speech tag and the tag must match one of those in the provided list. "VerB" does not match the format or case of any tag in the list, particularly "VB" which is used to denote verbs. Moreover, "quickly" is an adverb and should be tagged as "RB" according to the standard tags provided (although we can't check this without knowing the input, the format of the output is enough to determine non-compliance). 

Based on the format requirements and incorrect part of speech tag format, the output does not comply with the description.

ERR
